resources.string: Q3. The (U.S.) Declaration of Independence was Adopted in 1776.
Q2. The Supreme law of the land is the Constitution.
Q4. The two rights in the Declaration of Independence are: \n \t life \n \t pursuit of happiness.
Q5. Freedom of religion means: \n \t You can practice any religion, or not practice a religion.
Q6. Journalists is one branch or part of the government.
Q7. Congress does not make federal laws.
Q8. There are one hundred (100) U.S. Senators.
